me.recsfor.group

Class MovieInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • me.recsfor.group.MovieInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class MovieInfo
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    A servlet to build group pages for movies and TV shows. It can be initialized using the request parameter (the title of the move/show). The request parameter has no associated name. For example, MovieInfo?Blade+Runner.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
